apple_vendor_description: Apple’s rendering of this emoji showcases a couple, a man with a dark skin tone and another person without a specified skin tone, connected by a vibrant red heart, all brought to life with Apple’s characteristic glossy finish and realistic lighting. The figures are designed with smooth, rounded forms and a gentle, loving gaze, conveying a strong sense of unity and deep affection. This emoji, as seen on Apple devices, beautifully symbolizes romantic relationships, love, and partnership, adding an emotional depth to conversations.
